name: Yuanwu
description: Yuanwu owns a boxing gym where he teaches Leihuangquan and health management. He is well-respected in the community for his cordial demeanor and pleasant temperament.

details.Basic Attack: Perform up to 5 continuous attacks, dealing Electro DMG.
details.Heavy Attack: Consume Stamina to attack the target, dealing Electro DMG.
details.Mid-air Attack: Consume Stamina to launch a Plunging Attack, dealing Electro DMG.
details.Dodge Counter: Use Basic Attack after a successful Dodge to attack the target, dealing Electro DMG.

resonance_skill.name: Leihuang Master
resonance_skill.description: Summon a Thunder Wedge that deals Electro DMG and creates a Thunder Field.

details.Thunder Wedge: Forms a Thunder Field centered on the wedge for 12s. Rumbling Spark (Forte) and Blazing Might (Liberation) immediately detonate the wedge, dealing Electro DMG (counted as Resonance Skill DMG).
details.Thunder Field: While inside, on-field character triggers a Coordinated Attack from the Thunder Wedge when attacks hit, dealing Electro DMG. Can trigger once every 1.2s; effect lasts 1.5s.

resonance_liberation.name: Blazing Might
resonance_liberation.description: Awaken thunder and grant all nearby characters the Lightning Infused status for 10s (greatly increased anti-interruption), then deliver a powerful blow that deals Electro DMG.

details.Rumbling Spark: When Readiness is full, long-press Resonance Skill to consume all Readiness, cast Rumbling Spark (Electro DMG), and enter Lightning Infused.
details.Thunder Uprising: With full Readiness, Resonance Skill Thunder Wedge will cast Thunder Uprising, dealing Electro DMG.
details.Lightning Infused: Greatly increased anti-interruption. Basic Attacks hit a larger area and deplete Vibration Strength faster; Heavy Attacks and Dodge Counters attack faster and deplete Vibration Strength faster. Use Basic Attack within 3s after a Heavy Attack or successful Counter to cast Thunderweaver, dealing Electro DMG (treated as Basic Attack DMG).
details.Edge: Max Readiness 100. While a Thunder Wedge is on the field, gain 6 Readiness per second even off-field. Each Coordinated Attack from the wedge grants 5 Readiness.

inherent_skill1.name: Thunderweaver
inherent_skill1.description: Thunder Uprising DMG multiplier +40% and its Vibration Strength depletion is enhanced.

inherent_skill2.name: Reserved Confidence
inherent_skill2.description: Greatly expands the ranges of Thunder Field and Thunder Uprising. When exiting combat state with Readiness not full, automatically leaves 1 Thunder Wedge in place.

intro_skill.name: Thunder Bombardment
intro_skill.description: Attack the target, dealing Electro DMG.

outro_skill.name: Lightning Manipulation
outro_skill.description: Summon thunderbolts at the skill target, dealing significant Vibration Strength depletion to enemies hit.

resonance_chain.s1: While in Lightning Infused, Basic Attack Speed +20% and Heavy Attack Speed +20%.
resonance_chain.s2: Intro Skill Thunder Bombardment additionally restores 15 Resonance Energy for Yuanwu.
resonance_chain.s3: When Thunder Wedge’s Coordinated Attack hits, its DMG is further increased by 20% of Yuanwu’s DEF.
resonance_chain.s4: Casting Blazing Might grants the on-field character a Shield equal to 200% of Yuanwu’s DEF for 10s.
resonance_chain.s5: While Thunder Wedge is on the field, Yuanwu’s Resonance Liberation DMG Bonus is increased by 50%.
resonance_chain.s6: All teammates within Thunder Wedge range gain +32% DEF for 3s.
